attributes.action: To encourage firework manufacturers to have a selection of silent fireworks.
attributes.additional_details: Its not about me its all of the above.
attributes.background:
To encourage them to work with those who don't like noisy fireworks.
There are a few groups that dislike them. Veterans, Children, OAP'S, Special Needs Groups, and lots of pets as well as wild animals.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549758

The Government is not responsible for the products manufacturers choose to produce, but we think the above petition calls for a similar action.
